headline: HPE PT Raised to $24, Buy — Juniper Deal, AI Demand Fuel Optimism
summary: Hewlett-Packard Enterprise Company (NYSE:HPE) is a Must-Watch AI stock on Wall Street. On July 11, BofA Securities analyst Wamsi Mohan raised the price target on the stock to $24.00 (from $23.00) while maintaining a “Buy” rating. The reason behind the price target adjustment is that the firm now expects increased cost synergy from the Juniper […]

headline: Citi Updates SMCI to $52 PT, Stays Neutral Amid AI Optimism, Margin Concerns
summary: Super Micro Computer, Inc. (NASDAQ:SMCI) is a Must-Watch AI Stock on Wall Street. On July 11, Citi analyst Asiya Merchant raised the price target on the stock to $52.00 (from $37.00) while maintaining a “Neutral” rating. The firm quoted improving demand for AI servers and the ramp of Nvidia’s GB200/300 platforms, which started shipping in […]
